hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.description: Software Engineering student passionate about creating unique digital experiences. Specialized in frontend web development, functional interface design, and technological innovation to transform ideas into high-impact solutions. ‚ö°

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Software Engineering student focused on web application development, UX/UI design, and modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. My passion lies in creating projects that integrate creativity, functionality, and an innovative approach inspired by the gaming world.
